reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Humanitarian aid; support to WFP logistics in COVID-19 crisis
Humanitaarinen apu; tuki WFP:n logistiikkatoimille COVID-19-kriisissa

description.narrative: World Food Programme WFP is an operative programme of the UN which has a central role in all humanitarian crises globally. Following its role as the lead of the global humanitarian logistics and emergency telecommunications clusters WFP is at the core of t he global COVID-19 response. The importance of the WFP in securing the logistics and supply chain has significantly increased after commercial transport capacity has been downgraded. As a critical component of the COVID-19 Global Humanitarian Response Plan (GHRP) WFP urgently needs 965 MUSD. Finland contributes 3 MEUR towards the WFP service provision as part of the GHRP.

Maailman ruokaohjelma WFP on YK:n operatiivinen ohjelma jolla on keskeinen rooli maailman kaikissa kriiseissa. WFP on globaalin COVID-19-vasteen avainasemassa silla se vastaa koko humanitaarisen jarjestelman logistiikka- ja tietoliikennepalvelusta. Kaupall isten yhteyksien vahennyttya radikaalisti on WFP:n merkitys logistiikan ja hankintaketjujen turvaajana korostunut merkittavasti. WFP tarvitsee valittomasti osana YK:n keskitettya COVID-19-hataapuvetoomusta 965 MUSD. Rahoitetaan WFP:n koronaviruspandemiasta aiheutuvia logistiikkakustannuksia 3 miljoonalla eurolla.
